name: meta.Game
description:
The only game that doesn't want you to play it! (If you exclude all of the others)

This game will politely ask you to stop playing. You have two choices: obey, or lock your doors. (for legal purposes THIS IS A JOKE. silly skeleton man doesn't know where you live lol)

This game also has graphics comparable to incredible games such as Cyberpunk 2077, Portal (with RTX), Ghost of Tsushima, and Roblox on the lowest possible graphics settings.

oh also theres a secret ending btw
